- Up: Clear space (row 8, col 13) is available for movement.
- Down: Wall (row 10, col 13) blocks movement.
- Left: Clear space (row 9, col 12) is also an option.
- Right: Moving back (row 9, col 14), which we just came from.

### Decision
Since I cannot move down due to the wall, I can either move up or left. However, since moving left would require going back to the previous position and it doesn't bring any strategic advantage, I will choose to move **up**.

``` Action:4 ```
This action will take me to (row 8, col 13), allowing me to continue navigating towards a more favorable position for encountering scared birds.
